description:
Kululu`s being unexpectedly nice!  What in the world could have caused that?!  And then it`s White Day, and Momoka has the ultimate plan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How to Succeed in Pekopon Conquering Without Really Trying.
Keroro la débrouille / Opération déclaration d`amour
Kururu Uchuu de Umakuyaru Houhou de Arimasu / Momoka White Day Choujou Sakusen de Arimasu
クルル 宇宙でうまくやる方法 であります / 桃華 W-(ホワイト)デイ頂上作戦 であります
